mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS id_user, u.username, u.password, u.name AS name_user, u.email, u.role_id, r.id AS id_role, r.name AS name_role, r.description FROM tb_user u JOIN tb_role r ON u.role_id=r.id WHERE u.role_id = #{roles.roleId} ORDER BY u.id
SELECT r.id AS id_role, r.name AS name_role, r.description FROM tb_role r WHERE r.id = #{roleId}
SELECT r.id AS id_role, r.name AS name_role, r.description FROM tb_role r WHERE r.id != 1
SELECT u.id AS id_user, u.username, u.password, u.name AS name_user, u.email, u.role_id FROM tb_user u WHERE username = #{username}
